<<<<<<< HEAD
The pearle of prayer most pretious and powerfull, or, A Christian treatise most necessarie for all these that desire to shew that wrath to come ... By Mr. William Narne ... Narne, William, 1583?-1653.
[16], 453, [3] p.
Printed for Iohn Wreittoun, Edinburgh : 1620.
Errata on 2f4, final leaf. Some print faded and show-through; title page stained, illegible in places. Reproduction of original in the Union Theological Seminary (New York, N.Y.). Library.
=======
